analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders a mute icon as an inline SVG with a customizable fill color.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable navigation icon (mute) that can be placed in toolbars, menus or other UI elements requiring a mute symbol.

Components.name: IconMute
Components.description: Root component wrapping the SVG markup for the mute icon and exposing a `fill` prop to control the icon color.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Defines the `fill` prop for the component.

Dependencies: CSS custom property --black (used in default fill value)
analysis.Usage:
Import this component where you need the mute icon, for example:

import IconMute from 'modules/icons/navigation/IconMute.vue'

<IconMute fill="#ff0000" />
Notes: Default `fill` prop is declared as an object with a `position` key, which may be a typoâ€”expected a string.
SVG has fixed width and height but inherits fill from the `fill` prop.
No scoped styles section is present; styling is driven entirely by the SVG attributes and CSS variables.
